How to play QuizSci
QuizSci is a fun quick 1 vs 1 science quiz game made by Ameer Hamoodi. To start playing you can either make an account or start playing anonymously by clicking the start playing button. Search through the lobbies to find a category of your likeing, then press join. Once there are two players the game will start. You will be given a series of questions every 10 seconds, you have the given time to answer the question.
